title: Romance to Jealousy
original_name: ロマンスとジェラシー
sinopse:
Yotsugawa was invited to stay over and had a passionate night with Kyouda, the handsome man he fell in love with at first sight. Right after the lovey-dovey pair begin to form a bond, Yotsugawa notices Kyouda dreaming of another man in his sleep...

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)
